English Singers You Should Look Out For in 2015

By Constant Gardner & Confusion

There are always fresh and exciting new artists bubbling up in England, often combining sounds and styles in unique ways and creating music that is either eventually embraced by the mainstream or ends up influencing it. From those on the cusp of stardom to those who are just getting started, these 18 English artists are killing it right now, and shaping the sound of the future.

Get to know them today, because they'll be unmissable in 2015.

Related: 25 Rappers You Should Get to Know Before They Blow Up
